Description: Solid-cast bronze seated figure of Imhotep; unrolled papyrus on the lap; hieroglyphic inscription on rectangular base.
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, p. 217
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
